history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Randy
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER panda
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Brandon
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER I want transit directions.
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Okay, going to brandon rd. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER 10 Deadwood
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER I want to be from Fifth and Atwood.
TTS Okay, going to fifth avenue and atwood st. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where do you want to leave from?
USER Fifth and Atwood
TTS Okay, leaving from fifth avenue and atwood st. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 12:26 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 min.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to  </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER wait
TTS Take your time and let me know when you are finished.
USER change destination
USER change destination
